tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"圣书","italic": false,"color":"white"}',Lore:['{"text":"牧师特性：","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"静息成为了加速冷却而不是恢复生命。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"一般情况是冷却2.5x，瞬息万变中是5x。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"text":"ᛥ 附魔  ","italic": false,"color":"blue"},{"text":"击退 II","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"❤ 伤害  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"3 点","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":"      ❇ 攻速  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"每秒 1.2 次","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
